text: Tammy is a 2014 American comedy film directed and co-written by Ben Falcone and produced, co-written by, and starring Melissa McCarthy as the title character. The film also stars Susan Sarandon, Allison Janney, Gary Cole, Mark Duplass, with Dan Aykroyd, and Kathy Bates. It was released on July 2, 2014.The film received negative reviews from critics, but was a box office success, grossing over $100 million from a $20 million budget.
